reuters.title: BANKERS TRUST <BT> FILES 400 MLN DLR OFFERING
reuters.body: Bankers Trust New York Corp filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission for a shelf offering of up to 400 mln dlrs of subordinated debentures on terms to be set at the time of sale. The bank holding company said proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes including investments in or extensions of credit to its subsidiaries. Underwriters were not named in the draft prospectus. Reuter 
